title: Scientists shed light on processes behind age-related decline in brain structures

title_detail.value: Scientists shed light on processes behind age-related decline in brain structures

summary: Aging can cause damage to support cells in the white matter, which in turn may lead to damage in the grey matter of the hippocampus, finds a new study.

summary_detail.value: Aging can cause damage to support cells in the white matter, which in turn may lead to damage in the grey matter of the hippocampus, finds a new study.
